High-quality men’s basics are few and far between these days, especially at an accessible price point. That is until DUER hit the scene. The brand offers a contemporary take on menswear, providing unmatched value, style, and comfort. With a range of performance trousers (including the most comfortable jeans ever), tops, outwear, and accessories, DUER has made getting dressed easier than ever for the modern man. Typically, brands that make clothes of the same caliber as DUER charge a significant markup for access to unique fabrics and simple yet impactful designs. However, DUER ensures value is at the front and center of the brand, furthered by their incredible Black Friday sale, which Fashionbeans readers get exclusive access to. Keep reading to learn more about why we’re shopping DUER this year and key pieces to look out for during their Black Friday sale. Note: FashionBeans readers get exclusive early access to the VIP Sale using THIS LINK from November 22nd to November 24th.  In This ArticleWhy We're Shopping DUEROur PicksFinal Thoughts duerperformance / Instagram Exclusive: FashionBeans readers get exclusive early access to the VIP Sale using THIS LINK from November 22nd to November 24th.  Instead of pumping out more of the same cotton and polyester pieces that most menswear brands feature, DUER has taken a different approach to clothing. Made thoughtfully from innovative materials focusing on performance and stretch, DUER has turned the garment industry on its head by providing guys with a new way to dress. Gone are the days of being held back by constricting jeans, rigid chinos, and starchy button downs. DUER specializes in plant based and recycled fabrics that are equally at home in the backroads as they are on the slick city streets. DUER also takes the mystery out of putting together a polished outfit. All of the brand’s pieces work seamlessly together, whether you’re building out your ideal office attire, looking to fill gaps in your wardrobe or need a good looking get up to turn heads during the holidays. Given that the festive season and the new year are right around the corner, there’s no better time to update your rotation. DUER has granted Fashionbeans readers exclusive access to their Black Friday sale to give you first dibs on the pieces lining your wishlist – or to snag gifts for everyone in your life. Need a bit of inspiration? Below is everything we’re shopping for during DUER’s Black Friday sale. Slim Fit Performance Denim Every man needs a pair of jeans to just throw on and go. This slim fit option is as easy to dress up as it is to keep casual, with a subtle taper, classic dark wash and flattering silhouette. Made from DUER’s signature Performance Denim, these jeans are packed with stretch to move with you wherever the day leads. Finished with fabric that regulates temperature and fights off odors, this is the ultimate pick if you’re gunning to get more wear out of your denim. Colors: 10 | Sizes: 28 – 40 | Black Friday Deal: On Sale Athletic Straight Fit Performance Denim If you prefer your jeans on the roomier side, you can’t go wrong with DUER’s Athletic Fit. Featuring the brand’s Performance Denim, you’ll find yourself reaching for these jeans no matter the occasion. Given the generous amount of stretch and the high quality construction, they’re easy to wear in urban settings, the backcountry, and even for formal occasions. Available in two length options, these jeans are an easy going choice for everyday wear and a wardrobe staple that every man should own. Colors: 6 | Sizes: 30 – 40 | Black Friday Deal: On Sale No Sweat Slim Fit Chinos When you need something a little dressier than jeans but not quite as fancy as suit pants, chinos should be your first port of call and this pair leaves guys wanting for nothing. But rather than using rigid fabric as customary with most chinos, DUER has reengineered this classic garment. Sleek enough for office wear, but with all the stretch and comfort of your favorite sweats, these pants are specially designed to keep you feeling your best no matter how long the day gets. Colors: 13 | Sizes: 28 – 38 | Black Friday Deal: On Sale No Sweat Jogger Casual is king when it comes to joggers, and this pair is a foolproof upgrade from a basic cotton pair. Made for versatile, casual wear from DUER’s stretch fabric, these joggers are as comfy as they are good looking, especially in the best selling army green colorway. They’re a bit more chinos than classic sweatpants, but this makes them even easier to wear out and about without looking like a slob. The devil’s in the details here, from the antibacterial lyocell fabric, the belt loops that complement the drawstring waist, and the detailing on the left thigh to give the pants a touch of dimension. Colors: 6 | Sizes: 28 – 40 | Black Friday Deal: On Sale Live Free Relaxed Adventure Pant Any guy on the go will live in these pants. Made for the man who never backs down from an adventure, DUER’s Live Free trousers are ready to accompany you anywhere life leads. Designed for rugged wear, these pants are packed with practical features like breathable, water repellent fabric, four way stretch, and an athletic gusset, plus plenty of secure pockets and a drawcord at the ankle to tighten as needed. While they have all the makings of technical gear, these pants still have a solid street appeal, making them well suited to urban wear. If you need one pair of pants that can do it all, these are the ones to choose. Colors: 3 | Sizes: 28 – 40 | Black Friday Deal: On Sale Pure Pima Vintage Pocket Tee It’s indisputable that every man should own a solid pocket tee, and this Pima cotton option will be the backbone of a put together casual outfit. It goes well with anything, from jeans to chinos and joggers, and the impossibly soft fabric will ensure it stays front and center in your rotation. Rather than a rigid solid color, the faded blue brings a bit of a vintage feel to the garment, with a relaxed fit that looks equally at home tucked in or worn loose. Colors: 3 | Sizes: S – 2XL | Black Friday Deal: On Sale Performance Stretch Button Down Shirt A really good button down shirt is few and far between. Too often, they’re starchy, inflexible, and crazy itchy while somehow being too thin and weighing you down simultaneously. If you’ve grown tired of tugging at your collar during long workdays, this option is as classic looking as it gets, with enhanced fabric that will make it something you want to wear, not what you reach for out of obligation. Ideal for office settings and all of the events during the holiday season, this oxford is thoughtfully made from soft, stretch fabric that will allow you actually to lift your arms for once. Talk about refreshing. Colors: 5 | Sizes: S – 2XL | Black Friday Deal: On Sale All Weather 3-in-1 Insulated Softshell Jacket Imagine if your favorite denim jacket could withstand the frigid chills of the winter months. Instead of being packed away with the rest of your transitional clothing, this jean jacket is designed for four season wear and functions as the perfect everyday staple. It starts with a traditional trucker silhouette that’s been weatherproofed to protect against wind and rain. The coat takes it a step further with an innovative, detachable puffer vest that zips into the interior for a hefty dose of insulation. Yes to extra warmth, no to extra bulk. Reviewers boast that this jacket has gotten them through below freezing temperatures, especially when worn with an extra layer. You no longer need to choose between warm but snowman-looking or freezing but stylish. Colors: 1 | Sizes: XS – 2XL | Black Friday Deal: Cyber Monday Deep Discount Merino Wool Beanie No winter look is complete without a beanie. If you want the softest, most comfortable money can buy, Merino wool is the creme de la creme. It’s unbelievably soft for a luxurious look and feel while warm yet breathable for impeccable temperature regulation. Whether you choose it for yourself or gift it to a loved one, this beanie is the number one winter accessory we’re rocking this year. Colors: 4 | Sizes: One Size | Black Friday Deal: Included in Holiday Bundle starting December 3 Performance Stretch Belt Belts have their practical function, sure, but a really good belt also adds something extra to an outfit that says that you care about how you look. This option from DUER has a subtle woven pattern to introduce texture into a guy’s wardrobe. Instead of constricting you the way a leather belt might, it’s made from elastic material, offering a significant amount of stretch. No more uncomfortable digging when you sit down and no more fiddling with belt holes after a huge lunch. In fact, this belt skips the holes entirely, giving you free rein to secure it anywhere you’d like through the gaps in the braided construction. Rather than holding you back, this belt will ebb and flow with you throughout the currents of your day. It’s also under $20 during DUER’s Black Friday Sale, so you don’t want to sleep on this must-have accessory. Instead of pumping out more of the same cotton and polyester pieces that most menswear brands feature, DUER has taken a different approach to clothing. Made thoughtfully from innovative materials focusing on performance and stretch, DUER has turned the garment industry on its head by providing guys with a new way to dress. Gone are the days of being held back by constricting jeans, rigid chinos, and starchy button downs. DUER specializes in plant based and recycled fabrics that are equally at home in the backroads as they are on the slick city streets.

DUER also takes the mystery out of putting together a polished outfit. All of the brand’s pieces work seamlessly together, whether you’re building out your ideal office attire, looking to fill gaps in your wardrobe or need a good looking get up to turn heads during the holidays.

Given that the festive season and the new year are right around the corner, there’s no better time to update your rotation. DUER has granted Fashionbeans readers exclusive access to their Black Friday sale to give you first dibs on the pieces lining your wishlist – or to snag gifts for everyone in your life.

Need a bit of inspiration? Below is everything we’re shopping for during DUER’s Black Friday sale.

Slim Fit Performance Denim

Every man needs a pair of jeans to just throw on and go. This slim fit option is as easy to dress up as it is to keep casual, with a subtle taper, classic dark wash and flattering silhouette. Made from DUER’s signature Performance Denim, these jeans are packed with stretch to move with you wherever the day leads. Finished with fabric that regulates temperature and fights off odors, this is the ultimate pick if you’re gunning to get more wear out of your denim.

Colors: 10 | Sizes: 28 – 40 | Black Friday Deal: On Sale

Athletic Straight Fit Performance Denim

If you prefer your jeans on the roomier side, you can’t go wrong with DUER’s Athletic Fit. Featuring the brand’s Performance Denim, you’ll find yourself reaching for these jeans no matter the occasion. Given the generous amount of stretch and the high quality construction, they’re easy to wear in urban settings, the backcountry, and even for formal occasions. Available in two length options, these jeans are an easy going choice for everyday wear and a wardrobe staple that every man should own.

Colors: 6 | Sizes: 30 – 40 | Black Friday Deal: On Sale

No Sweat Slim Fit Chinos

When you need something a little dressier than jeans but not quite as fancy as suit pants, chinos should be your first port of call and this pair leaves guys wanting for nothing. But rather than using rigid fabric as customary with most chinos, DUER has reengineered this classic garment. Sleek enough for office wear, but with all the stretch and comfort of your favorite sweats, these pants are specially designed to keep you feeling your best no matter how long the day gets.

Colors: 13 | Sizes: 28 – 38 | Black Friday Deal: On Sale

No Sweat Jogger

Casual is king when it comes to joggers, and this pair is a foolproof upgrade from a basic cotton pair. Made for versatile, casual wear from DUER’s stretch fabric, these joggers are as comfy as they are good looking, especially in the best selling army green colorway. They’re a bit more chinos than classic sweatpants, but this makes them even easier to wear out and about without looking like a slob. The devil’s in the details here, from the antibacterial lyocell fabric, the belt loops that complement the drawstring waist, and the detailing on the left thigh to give the pants a touch of dimension.

Colors: 6 | Sizes: 28 – 40 | Black Friday Deal: On Sale

Live Free Relaxed Adventure Pant

Any guy on the go will live in these pants. Made for the man who never backs down from an adventure, DUER’s Live Free trousers are ready to accompany you anywhere life leads. Designed for rugged wear, these pants are packed with practical features like breathable, water repellent fabric, four way stretch, and an athletic gusset, plus plenty of secure pockets and a drawcord at the ankle to tighten as needed. While they have all the makings of technical gear, these pants still have a solid street appeal, making them well suited to urban wear. If you need one pair of pants that can do it all, these are the ones to choose.

Colors: 3 | Sizes: 28 – 40 | Black Friday Deal: On Sale

Pure Pima Vintage Pocket Tee

It’s indisputable that every man should own a solid pocket tee, and this Pima cotton option will be the backbone of a put together casual outfit. It goes well with anything, from jeans to chinos and joggers, and the impossibly soft fabric will ensure it stays front and center in your rotation. Rather than a rigid solid color, the faded blue brings a bit of a vintage feel to the garment, with a relaxed fit that looks equally at home tucked in or worn loose.

Colors: 3 | Sizes: S – 2XL | Black Friday Deal: On Sale

Performance Stretch Button Down Shirt

A really good button down shirt is few and far between. Too often, they’re starchy, inflexible, and crazy itchy while somehow being too thin and weighing you down simultaneously. If you’ve grown tired of tugging at your collar during long workdays, this option is as classic looking as it gets, with enhanced fabric that will make it something you want to wear, not what you reach for out of obligation. Ideal for office settings and all of the events during the holiday season, this oxford is thoughtfully made from soft, stretch fabric that will allow you actually to lift your arms for once. Talk about refreshing.

Colors: 5 | Sizes: S – 2XL | Black Friday Deal: On Sale

All Weather 3-in-1 Insulated Softshell Jacket

Imagine if your favorite denim jacket could withstand the frigid chills of the winter months. Instead of being packed away with the rest of your transitional clothing, this jean jacket is designed for four season wear and functions as the perfect everyday staple. It starts with a traditional trucker silhouette that’s been weatherproofed to protect against wind and rain. The coat takes it a step further with an innovative, detachable puffer vest that zips into the interior for a hefty dose of insulation. Yes to extra warmth, no to extra bulk. Reviewers boast that this jacket has gotten them through below freezing temperatures, especially when worn with an extra layer. You no longer need to choose between warm but snowman-looking or freezing but stylish.

Colors: 1 | Sizes: XS – 2XL | Black Friday Deal: Cyber Monday Deep Discount

Merino Wool Beanie

No winter look is complete without a beanie. If you want the softest, most comfortable money can buy, Merino wool is the creme de la creme. It’s unbelievably soft for a luxurious look and feel while warm yet breathable for impeccable temperature regulation. Whether you choose it for yourself or gift it to a loved one, this beanie is the number one winter accessory we’re rocking this year.

Colors: 4 | Sizes: One Size | Black Friday Deal: Included in Holiday Bundle starting December 3

Performance Stretch Belt

Belts have their practical function, sure, but a really good belt also adds something extra to an outfit that says that you care about how you look. This option from DUER has a subtle woven pattern to introduce texture into a guy’s wardrobe. Instead of constricting you the way a leather belt might, it’s made from elastic material, offering a significant amount of stretch. No more uncomfortable digging when you sit down and no more fiddling with belt holes after a huge lunch. In fact, this belt skips the holes entirely, giving you free rein to secure it anywhere you’d like through the gaps in the braided construction. Rather than holding you back, this belt will ebb and flow with you throughout the currents of your day. It’s also under $20 during DUER’s Black Friday Sale, so you don’t want to sleep on this must-have accessory.
